trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade que permite que um host Common Language Runtime participe do fluxo ou migração do contexto de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Se atual <xref:System.AppDomainManager> tem uma referência a um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> no seu <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, o common language runtime chama o Gerenciador de sempre que uma chamada para o <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método ocorre, para permitir que o host participar de fluxo do contexto de execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Captura o contexto de execução do host do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> que representa o contexto de execução do host do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> é criado usando um identificador seguro que contém o `IUnknown` ponteiro para o host de execução do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: O estado de contexto anterior para o qual reverter.

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o contexto de execução do host para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState` deve ser o objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> não foi criado no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> is not the last state for the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> não é o último estado para o <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: Requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to be set.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Define o contexto de execução do host atual para o contexto de execução do host especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto para restaurar o <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> a seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> método define o contexto de execução do host atual <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> que foi usado como argumento para outra <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> chamada de método não pode ser passada como parâmetro para este método.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para criar uma cópia de um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> de objeto e, em seguida, usar a cópia para definir o contexto de execução do host.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> método usando o objeto retornado por este método para restaurar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> não foi adquirido por meio de uma operação de captura.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> has been the argument to a previous <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> tem sido o argumento para uma chamada de método <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> anterior.

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: Requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.
